channel.title: Visual Item ID and description table
channel.description:
Just got this all set up for an easy way to visually find all Items and item descriptions for every item ever introduced to the original RSC world. [sup]Credit to vortex for original html work and images.[/sup]
[url=http://www.ambardia.com/rsc/items.html]http://www.ambardia.com/rsc/items.html[/url] sample info: [img]http://ambardia.com/rsc/Items/items_files/575.png[/img]- 575 - Christmas cracker - Use on another player to pull it

item.title: Visual Item ID and description table
item.dc:creator: @RSCShadow RSCShadow
item.description:
@RSCShadow wrote:

[quote=“vortex, post:5, topic:432118”]Can’t remember why I didn’t just make the background transparent :S[/quote]That’s what I’ve been thinking.

Read full topic
item.source: Visual Item ID and description table

item.title: Visual Item ID and description table
item.dc:creator: @vortex vortex
item.description:
@vortex wrote:

[quote=“Ambard, post:3, topic:432118”][quote author=vortex link=topic=534827.msg3910103#msg3910103 date=1328637568]
Looks to me like you just copied mine :rolleyes:
http://jamili.da3rx.com/rsc/
[/quote]

Oh shit man your right. I’m sorry. One of my guys gave me the raw html and i fixed it up for my site. You want me to take it off or add proper credits to everything?[/quote]It’s ok, do what you want with it. I did upload the pictures with white and black backgrounds too though; http://jamili.da3rx.com/rsc/?dir=img
Can’t remember why I didn’t just make the background transparent :S

Read full topic
item.source: Visual Item ID and description table

item.title: Visual Item ID and description table

item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

I will use vortexs like I always do

[quote=“vortex, post:2, topic:432118”]Looks to me like you just copied mine :rolleyes:

Oh shit man your right. I’m sorry. One of my guys gave me the raw html and i fixed it up for my site. You want me to take it off or add proper credits to everything?
